titleStmt.title: The danger of corrupting the faith by philosophy a sermon preach'd before the Right Honble, the Lord Mayor and Court of Aldermen at Guildhall-Chappel on Sunday, April 25, 1697 / by William Sherlock.
titleStmt.author: Sherlock, William, 1641?-1707.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
